name: superfine
description: Minimal view layer for creating declarative web user interfaces.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.build: npm-run-all build:pre-clean build:types build:tsickle build:gcc build:gzip build:post-clean
scripts.build:gcc: java -jar ./node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --externs externs/index.js --output_wrapper '(function(){var self=typeof module!="undefined"?module.exports:(this.superfine={});%output%})()' --use_types_for_optimization --assume_function_wrapper --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --module_resolution WEBPACK --language_in=ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out=ECMASCRIPT5 --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js_output_file=dist/superfine.js 'src/**.js'
